effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.7 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 798,560.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,634, further increased by 381 while you remain within its light.
